attributes.action: stop rasist attacks on white people.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We should live in a peaceful country, and most people do. However over the last few years there has only been a recognised racist issue with white people being racist towards ethnic groups. There is also racist attacks from black people towards whites, and most of the time they don't walk away being hurt by words. They don't walk away at all in 90% of cases.

rejection.details: If you believe a criminal offence has been committed, you should report this to the police.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
